alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Philadelphia; Western Chester; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 12:11PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Showers with strong winds will impact portions of New Castle, northwestern Salem, northwestern Gloucester, southeastern Montgomery, eastern Chester, western Philadelphia and Delaware Counties through 1245 PM EST... At 1210 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from near Chester Springs to near Kennett Square to North East. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Wilmington, Newark, Middletown, West Chester, Norristown, Chester, Phoenixville, West Norriton, Pennsville, Yeadon, Westtown, Carneys Point, Downingtown, Conshohocken, Folcroft, Swarthmore, Elsmere, Kennett Square and New Castle. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 1. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 313 and 334. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 11. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 23. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 342. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 15. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Philadelphia; Western Chester; Western Montgomery
